channel.title: Need help on a few things
channel.description: Well, I am trying to make a Runescape Account Creator, and am having some trouble. I want SCAR to open up [url=http://www.pctools.com/guides/password/?length=15&alpha=on&numeric=on&quantity=1&generate=true]http://www.pctools.com/guides/password/?length=15&alpha=on&numeric=on&quantity=1&generate=true[/url] that link, copy down the Random Password (Which will be used as a random username)and use it as the username. BUT I can not for the life of me figure out how to make SCAR open up a webpage. Also I need it to copy it down somehow. Is that even possible? So, basically that is what I need to learn how to do that! Thanks!

item.title: Need help on a few things
item.dc:creator: @GoF GoF
item.description:
@GoF wrote:

I doubt that’s possible… But you could just make SCAR generate random “passwords” like that

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on a few things

item.title: Need help on a few things

item.description:

Well, I am trying to make a Runescape Account Creator, and am having some trouble. I want SCAR to open up http://www.pctools.com/guides/password/?length=15&alpha=on&numeric=on&quantity=1&generate=true
that link, copy down the Random Password (Which will be used as a random username)and use it as the username. BUT I can not for the life of me figure out how to make SCAR open up a webpage. Also I need it to copy it down somehow. Is that even possible? So, basically that is what I need to learn how to do that! Thanks!
